messages.text: Good morning everyone I hope you all slept well!
Morning Aino! I tried a new soup recipe yesterday – barley and vegetables. Reminded me of my grandmother’s cooking.
That sounds wonderful, Kari. My mother used to make a similar soup whenever the weather turned cold.
Hello everyone, I'm Leena. I also love simple warm soups – they always remind me of family dinners.
Welcome, Leena Feel free to just listen or share a story whenever you feel ready.
The path by the lake was quite icy this morning. Please be careful if you go there.
Thanks for the heads-up, Esko. I almost slipped near the wooden bridge yesterday.
Maybe we choose the park route this week instead? It’s flatter and better lit.
That sounds nice. I walk a bit slower but would love to join for the park route sometime.
You’re very welcome, Leena. We always walk at a gentle pace and take breaks.
